# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Label)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
LabelPluginInfo.C
LabelCommonPluginInfo.C
LabelAttributes.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
LabelPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBG_SOURCES
LabelGUIPluginInfo.C
QvisLabelPlotWindow.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)
SET(LIBG_MOC_SOURCES
QvisLabelPlotWindow.h
)
QT_WRAP_CPP(GLabelPlot LIBG_SOURCES ${LIBG_MOC_SOURCES})

SET(LIBV_SOURCES
LabelViewerPluginInfo.C
avtLabelPlot.C
avtLabelFilter.C
avtLabelSubsetsFilter.C
avtLabelsMapper.C
avtLabelRenderer.C
avtMesaLabelRenderer.C
avtOpenGLLabelRenderer.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
LabelEnginePluginInfo.C
avtLabelPlot.C
avtLabelFilter.C
avtLabelSubsetsFilter.C
avtLabelsMapper.C
avtLabelRenderer.C
avtMesaLabelRenderer.C
avtOpenGLLabelRenderer.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
)

IF (NOT WIN32)
    SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(avtOpenGLLabelRenderer.C 
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-I ${OPENGL_INCLUDE_DIR}"
    )
ENDIF (NOT WIN32)
SET_SOURCE_FILES_PROPERTIES(avtMesaLabelRenderer.C 
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-I ${MESA_INCLUDE_DIR}"
)
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/IVP
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Plotter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/QtVisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/View
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Colleagues
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Interactors
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Proxies
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/Tools
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/gui
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/main
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/proxy
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/viewer/rpc
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/winutil
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${QT_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTCORE_INCLUDE_DIR}
${QT_QTGUI_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${PYTHON_INCLUDE_PATH} 
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visitpy/visitpy 
)


LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${QT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${MESA_LIBRARY_DIR} ${GLEW_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS})

ADD_LIBRARY(ILabelPlot ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ILabelPlot visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ILabelPlot)

IF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(GLabelPlot ${LIBG_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(GLabelPlot visitcommon gui )

    ADD_LIBRARY(VLabelPlot ${LIBV_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(VLabelPlot visitcommon viewer )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} GLabelPlot VLabelPlot)

    IF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)
        SET(LIBS_SOURCES
            LabelScriptingPluginInfo.C
            PyLabelAttributes.C
            ${COMMON_SOURCES}
        )
        ADD_LIBRARY(SLabelPlot ${LIBS_SOURCES})
        TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(SLabelPlot visitcommon visitpy ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
        SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} SLabelPlot)
    ENDIF(VISIT_PYTHON_SCRIPTING)

    IF(VISIT_JAVA)
        ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(JavaLabel ALL ${CMAKE_Java_COMPILER} ${CMAKE_Java_FLAGS} -d ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java -classpath ${VISIT_BINARY_DIR}/java LabelAttributes.java)
        ADD_DEPENDENCIES(JavaLabel JavaClient)
    ENDIF(VISIT_JAVA)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_SERVER_COMPONENTS_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ELabelPlot_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ELabelPlot_ser visitcommon avtplotter_ser avtpipeline_ser )
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ELabelPlot_ser)
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ELabelPlot_ser ENGINE)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ELabelPlot_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ELabelPlot_par visitcommon avtplotter_par avtpipeline_par )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ELabelPlot_par)
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ELabelPlot_par ENGINE)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_PLOT_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})

VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_PREFIX(${INSTALLTARGETS})
